snippet.title: Star Knight: Order of the Vortex - Official Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Releasing in Early Access: September 9th, 2024

Choose your ship, build your crew, and enter the Vortex...

Star Knight: Order of the Vortex is an upcoming roguelite, bullet-hell, shoot-em-up for PC. Play as a member of the Order of the Vortex, a Star Knight tasked with defending the human kingdoms from the terrors that lie within the Vortex.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2462090/Star_Knight_Order_of_the_Vortex/


Join the Discord:  https://discord.gg/gFvMcjEt
